dt2.9:1.3_2: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?
dt2.9:1.4_0: Te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.9:3.3_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:3.4_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:5.5_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:6.2_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena chahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.9:7.11_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:7.12_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:9.2_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.9:9.3_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:10.2_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.9:11.4_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:11.5_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:12.4_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:13.4_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:13.5_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:15.2_0: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:15.3_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:16.5_0: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena ye dhammā sampayuttā,
dt2.9:16.6_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:16.7_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:17.4_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.9:17.5_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:18.3_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.9:20.2_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena dvīhi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.9:20.3_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:21.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:21.2_0: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:21.3_0: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā,
dt2.9:22.4_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:24.2_0: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:24.3_0: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā,
dt2.9:24.4_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:24.5_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:25.1_0: Sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:25.2_0: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:25.3_0: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā,
dt2.9:25.4_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:26.2_0: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:26.3_0: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā,
dt2.9:26.4_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:26.5_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:27.1_0: Āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā,
dt2.9:27.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:28.1_0: Saṁyojanehi … ganthehi … oghehi … yogehi … nīvaraṇehi … parāmāsehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:28.2_0: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā,
dt2.9:28.3_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:28.4_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:29.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:31.7_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā.
dt2.9:32.3_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:32.4_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:32.5_0: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā,
dt2.9:32.6_0: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.9:32.7_0: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:33.1_0: Saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:33.2_0: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.9:33.7_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.9:34.2_2: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttā?
